# GUIcoder
App to introduce beginners to Tkinter.

# How to use:
Run through terminal with command: GUIcoder

Draw a rectangle in the window on the right, then press a button corresponding to the widget you want to use.

To use the palette, click the '+' buttons and choose the color, you can also write your hex color and press enter, then confirm. After that if you click on the color it will be copied to clipboard. To modify or remove the color click on it with the middle mouse button.
